description: Defines a Flutter provider class for managing and exposing a list of BusinessGroup objects, utilizing a data source for fetching data and ChangeNotifier for notifying UI updates.

classes.name: GroupsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass that manages a list of BusinessGroup objects, providing a method to asynchronously load data from a DataSource and notify listeners.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the list of BusinessGroup objects from the data source and updates the internal items list, then notifies listeners of the change.
